00017 class FilterBase
00018 {
00019 public:
00020     bool run( boost::shared_ptr<util::ProgressFeedback> = boost::shared_ptr<util::ProgressFeedback> () ) ;
00021 
00022     bool isValid() const { return valid; }
00023     virtual std::string getFilterName() const = 0;
00024 protected:
00025     virtual bool process() = 0;
00026     bool valid;

00029 
00030 template<typename TYPE, int NInput>
00031 class HasNInput : public FilterBase
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     void setInput( std::list<TYPE> inputList ) {
00035         if( inputList.size() != NInput ) {
00036             LOG( data::Runtime, warning ) << "The size of the input list (" << inputList.size()
00037                                           << ") passed to the filter \"" << getFilterName()
00038                                           << "\" does not coincide with the expected size ("
00039                                           << NInput << "). Filter object is not valid !";
00040             valid = false;
00041             return;
00042         }
00043 
00044         unsigned short index = 0;
00045         BOOST_FOREACH( typename std::list<TYPE>::const_reference elem, inputList ) {
00046             m_input[index++] = boost::shared_ptr<TYPE> ( new TYPE( elem ) );
00047         }
00048         valid = true;
00049     }
00050 
00051 protected:
00052     HasNInput() {
00053         valid = !NInput;
00054     };
00055     util::FixedVector<boost::shared_ptr<TYPE>, NInput> m_input;
00056 };
00057 
00058 template<typename TYPE, int NOutput>
00059 class HasNOutput
00060 {
00061 public:
00062     std::list<TYPE> getOutput() const {
00063         std::list<TYPE> retList;
00064 
00065         for( unsigned short i = 0; i < NOutput; i++ ) {
00066             retList.push_back( *( m_output[i] ) );
00067         }
00068 
00069         return retList;
00070     }
00071 
00072 protected:
00073     util::FixedVector<boost::shared_ptr<TYPE>, NOutput> m_output;
00074 };
00075 
00076 
00077 template<typename InType, typename OutType, int NInput, int NOutput >
00078 class Filter : public HasNInput<InType, NInput>, public HasNOutput<OutType, NOutput>
00079 {};
00080 
00081 
00082 //specialization for having fixed input size but variable outputsize
00083 template< typename InType, typename OutType, int NInput>
00084 class Filter < InType, OutType, NInput, -1 > : public HasNInput<InType, NInput>
00085 {
00086 public:
00087     std::list<OutType> getOutput() const {
00088         std::list<OutType> retList;
00089         BOOST_FOREACH( typename std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<OutType> >::const_reference elem, m_output ) {
00090             retList.push_back( *elem );
00091         }
00092         return retList;
00093     }
00094 
00095 protected:
00096     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<OutType> > m_output;
00097 };
00098 
00099 //specialization for having variable input size but fixed outputsize
00100 template< typename InType, typename OutType, int NOutput>
00101 class Filter < InType, OutType, -1, NOutput > : public FilterBase, public HasNOutput<OutType, NOutput>
00102 {
00103     void setInput( std::list<InType> inputList ) {
00104         if( inputList.size() == 0 ) {
00105             LOG( data::Runtime, warning ) << "The list passed to the filter \""
00106                                           << getFilterName() << "\" is empty. Filter object is not valid!";
00107         }
00108 
00109         BOOST_FOREACH( typename std::list<InType>::const_reference elem, inputList ) {
00110             m_input.push_back( boost::shared_ptr<InType> ( new InType( elem ) ) );
00111         }
00112         valid = true;
00113     }
00114 protected:
00115     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<InType> > m_input;
00116 };
